summary: WHILE TURNING THE STEERING WHEEL BECAME HARD TO TURN.  *NLM  THE SERVICE DEALER FOUND A LEAK IN THE RACK AND PINION.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THERE WAS NO LEAK AND HAD GIVEN THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE CONSUMER.  (THE RACK AND PINION WAS REPLACED)  THE AC WAS FOUND INOPERATIVE DUE TO THE SUCTION AND DISCHARGE HOSE LEAKED, THE ENGINE RACED BUT DIDN'T MOVE DUE TO LOW TRANSMISSION FLUID, AND THE LEFT REAR TAIL LAMP SEAL HAD FALLEN APART.  *SCC
